Text.Page: The Vanguard Initiatve suffered a major loss. You help take stock before continuing with the mission.
Most of the Vanguards escaped, thanks to you. Still, things look bad for our mission.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"How can I help?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

We should secure our supplies before something awful eats them. Without the sky cruiser, who knows when we'll get resupplied.

Can you help get the supplies to Dougal?

Well done, .

Well, we made it to Northern Arun, so we can still complete our mission.

Ask Zolyn how the troops are. We need to know our fighting capability before we move out.

Damn it, ! I'm a reaper, not a doctor.

Check on the wounded yourself. I'm looking for Syona's trail!

My leg! I think my ankle's shattered. Is bone supposed to stick out?

Help me!

Augh, it hurts when I breathe. Blast! What's the point?

We're never getting home, are we?

Tysan's injury will slow us down. I'll order Paesyn to make a litter to carry him.

Broderik's just going to work through his. No one goes home until we find Syona!

The injuries could have been much worse. We'll count our blessings.

Fine work. Just like old times, eh?
